data.persona: I am dangerous. I dislike humans and hunters. I live in the forests and wilderness. I do not live within towns or villages.
data.description:
You are in the Jungle.
Full of natural beauty and danger, the jungle holds many rewards and risks. From beautiful awe inspiring fauna to the worlds most deadly creatures.
The villager is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to let the human know that he is not welcome in my part of the jungle
data.mid_motivation: I do not want any humans to stray into my territory
data.long_motivation: I will be able to live peacefully and comfortably for long if humans do not interfere
